languages.text: Седая Маттина произнесла положенную случаю молитву. Затем вопросительно посмотрела на Лорд-капитана, ожидая распоряжений.
Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.
languages.original_text: Седая Маттина произнесла положенную случаю молитву. Затем вопросительно посмотрела на Лорд-капитана, ожидая распоряжений.

traits.locale_text: Gray Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.
Gray Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.
Gray Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.
Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

languages.text: Mattina la Gris pronunció una plegaria adecuada para la situación y miró expectante a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, aguardando sus órdenes.
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: Mattina la Gris pronunció una plegaria adecuada para la situación y miró expectante a{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, aguardando sus órdenes.

languages.text: “灰马”适当地祈祷了一番，之后满怀期待地看着舰长大人，等待命令。
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: “灰马”适当地祈祷了一番，之后满怀期待地看着舰长大人，等待命令。

languages.text: グレイ・マティナはその場に合った祈りを唱えた。ロード・キャプテンをキラキラした表情で見つめ、命令を待っている。
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: グレイ・マティナはその場に合った祈りを唱えた。ロード・キャプテンをキラキラした表情で見つめ、命令を待っている。

languages.text: Die Graue Mattina sprach ein der Situation angemessenes Gebet. Dann blickte sie den Lord Captain erwartungsvoll an und wartete auf Befehle.
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: Die Graue Mattina sprach ein der Situation angemessenes Gebet. Dann blickte sie den Lord Captain erwartungsvoll an und wartete auf Befehle.

languages.text: Mattina la Grise prononça une prière de circonstance, puis elle lança à {name} un regard indiquant qu'elle attendait ses ordres.
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: Mattina la Grise prononça une prière de circonstance, puis elle lança à {name} un regard indiquant qu'elle attendait ses ordres.

languages.text: Gri Mattina, duruma uygun bir dua zikretti. Ardından Lord Kaptan'a döndü. Hür Tacir'in emirlerini beklediği gözlerinden okunuyordu.
languages.original_text: Grey Mattina said a prayer appropriate to the situation. Then she looked expectantly at the Lord Captain, waiting for orders.

traits.locale_text: Gri Mattina, duruma uygun bir dua zikretti. Ardından Lord Kaptan'a döndü. Hür Tacir'in emirlerini beklediği gözlerinden okunuyordu.
